tests.name: 01212_empty_join_and_totals.sql
tests.query:
select * from system.one t1
join system.one t2
on t1.dummy = t2.dummy
limit 0
FORMAT TabSeparated;

tests.name: 01212_empty_join_and_totals.sql
tests.query:
select * from system.one t1
join system.one t2
on t1.dummy = t2.dummy
where t2.dummy > 0
FORMAT TabSeparated;
